name: RTK14: Scenario - The Lu Bu Campaign & Event Set
summary: A scenario and set of events are added to "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV". In Zhongyuan, Lu Bu and Yuan Shu had joined forces, expecting an attack from the Cao Cao - Liu Bei army. Meanwhile, Yuan Shao and Gongsun Zan were about to clash at Hebei, while Sun Ce was building strength in Jiangdong.
